extension.name: Content - JExtBOX Equation
extension.author: Galaa
extension.description:
This free light plugin helps to display math equations (LaTeX) and figures (PSPicture).

Visit www.JExtBOX.com for a full version:

  1. All front-end components and modules support
  2. Rendering equations which are added to DOM by AJAX
  3. An editor button and a popup modal window for inserting math easily
  4. Live preview before inserting an equation with the popup modal window
  5. Skips HTML tags inside pre and code
  6. Clean-up spaces after line equations
  7. MathJax version selection for CDN, local installation support, fallback to local installation, custom configuration of MathJax

field.name: mathjax-version
field.label: MathJax version
field.description: This free light plugin supports only the stable version 2 of MathJax. The parameter value should be formatted as '2.#.#' (no quotation marks).

field.name: paymentid
field.label: Payment or Invoice ID
field.description: Payment or Invoice ID from www.JExtBOX.com. It is used for upgrading to the paid full version.
